status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7l74v","text":"Prep P5ARP Plates 1-2 days before plating.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":6,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20fku","text":"Prepare working culture plates (CMA, PDA + amp) up to 1 week before plating.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahp2b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6k5a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8m8mu","text":"Check plates after 24-48 h.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"350j5","text":"Check for \"gold coin\" oospores at plate edges to indicate Pythium myriotylum. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":58,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aq5j","text":"Use CMA for oospore production","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dskau","text":"Use full strength PDA to increase hyphal growth for DNA extraction","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biu82","text":"Use V8 to increase hyphal growth for DNA extraction (untested)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"0cweh","text":"Select appropriate samples with black rotted segments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"x80dt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bu0bq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5B1CCCE9345711EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":474.4618181818182,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"7o3qs\",\"text\":\"Rotted segments of peanut seedling suitable for plating\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"PXL_20230609_203202431.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m8rjb62kp.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m8rhb62kp.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m8rib62kp.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m8rgb62kp.webp","width":377.64688856729373}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qva2","text":"Try with or without   ethanol soak for   or rinse in sterile RO water. Use a sieve in a small beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ddbi","text":"Do not use bleach due to Pythium sensitivity. [2]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"95","error_concentration":false,"guid":"91BB64C00FA211EE938F0739A6998716","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"BA56B7600EEC11EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72jpq","text":"Plate on P5ARP or other media with bacterial inhibition (CMA or PDA + amp) [4].","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vjgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k2t9","text":"Hyphal tip transfer using sterile pin to clean plates of CMA (V8 or PDA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a6t2i","text":"Cut up segments into 1/4 inch (1-2 cm) pieces.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1h101","text":"Select whether you want to bait from diseased hulls in soil or from seedlings grown in diseased soil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Peanut Seedlings
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fd3fh","text":"To bait from soil infested with Pythium using susceptible germinated seedlings.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Diseased Hulls
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6qs8e","text":"To plate from diseased hulls found in soil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8hccc","text":"Germinate susceptible seedlings by wrapping in RO-dampened paper towels and incubating for 2-4 days at   in the dark.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":103,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bcvo8","text":"Check daily to re-wet paper towels as necessary.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep1bl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7E6B18D00EED11EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"28","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5kgbe","text":"Cut up hull segments into 1/4 inch (1-2 cm) pieces.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"n9vo","text":"Blot completely dry on sterile paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72jpq","text":"Plate on P5ARP or other media with bacterial inhibition (CMA or PDA + amp).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":10,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fmce","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vjgg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Jeffers, S. N., \u0026 Martin, S. B. ","can_edit":true,"date":0,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1094/PD-70-1038","guid":"49633BA9341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"Plant Disease. 70(11), 1038–1043","protocol_id":null,"title":"Comparison of Two Media Selective for Phytophthora and Pythium Species"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8m8mu","text":"Check plates after 24-48 h. Pythium growth is quick, with white-cream hyphae.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":28,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"k2t9","text":"Do a hyphal tip transfer pf the growing mycelial edge using sterile loop to clean plates of CMA (V8 or PDA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"350j5","text":"Check for \"gold coin\" oospores at plate edges to likely indicate Pythium myriotylum. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":8}],"data":{}},{"key":"6qcal","text":"If so, continue to DNA sequencing protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D184D9D60EF111EEB7290A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.gene.affrc.go.jp/databases-micro_images_detail_en.php?id=473"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ja1t","text":"Plant germinated seeds in infested soil, in triplicate, in 4\" diameter pots with a drip tray. Maintain greenhouse at   humidity with temperatures between   and  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":154,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":160,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eujdk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"humidity","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"70","guid":"DCDCF4100EED11EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FAA613500EED11EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"24","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FF096D700EED11EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"30","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bhc00","text":"Water to maintain a level of 1-2\" in drip tray for the first 2 days, and then to maintain soil moisture without excessive water until seedlings reach 4-6\" in height.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alfap","text":"Harvest seedlings. Rinse plants thoroughly in RO water to remove soil particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2ftc","text":"Try with or without 95% ethanol soak for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5di8d","text":"Do not use bleach due to Pythium sensitivity.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":25,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p1mq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ccl61","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"616ce","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dsas","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8vfa6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"180A00140EF011EEB7290A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Stanghellini, M. E., \u0026 Kronland, W. C.","can_edit":true,"date":473385600,"doi":"https://www.apsnet.org/publications/phytopathology/backissues/Documents/1987Articles/Phyto77n08_1192.pdf","guid":"49633B1A341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"Phytopathology","protocol_id":null,"title":"Detrimental effect of surface sterilization on isolation of Pythium spp. from feeder roots (Abstr.)"}},"2":{"type":"citation","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"authors":"Garren, K. H. ","can_edit":true,"date":820454400,"doi":"https://doi.org/10.1111/j.1439-0434.1966.tb02238.x","duration":240,"guid":"49633B63341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","journal":"Journal of Phytopathology. 55(4), 359–367","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"protocol_id":null,"start":null,"title":"Peanut (Groundnut) Microfloras and Pathogenesis in Peanut Pod Rot"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1goj","text":"Rinse in sterile RO water for   using a sieve in a small beaker.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"44F45FF00EF011EE94CFF57639F4BF7E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4a9cl","text":"At 4 DAP, trim to 1 seed/pot, or carefully repot in separate pots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"35oka","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cf8m8","text":"Grow for 15-20 days and check for rot symptoms. Brown rot will start at ~4-6 DAP, wilt at ~6-18 DAP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"famnl","text":"Those exposed to higher temperatures may be more susceptible to rot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b7r93","text":"Blot dry on sterile paper towels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
